original_text: therefore thus says the Lord God: Behold, I am against you, O Tyre, and will bring up many nations against you, as the sea brings up its waves.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 두로야 내가 너를 대적하여 바다가 그 파도를 굽이치게 함 같이 여러 민족들이 와서 너를 치게 하리니

sentences.original_text: therefore thus says the Lord God
I am against you, O Tyre
and will bring up many nations against you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 여러 민족을 너를 치려고 일으키리라

sentences.original_text: as the sea brings up its waves
